text:
We had a wonderful dining experience at this Korean BBQ buffet! The food were fresh, flavorful, and well-prepared. From the tender meats to the delicious side dishes, Taste great with their sauce in particular. The only downside was limited choice. The outdoor ambience was another highlight — very soothing, clean, and inviting, making us feel relaxed and welcomed from the moment we stepped in.

Both my kids and the elderly members truly enjoyed themselves. The staff were kind and attentive, and the environment was comfortable for all ages.

The price is fair considering the quality and variety of the food. Highly recommended — we’ll certainly be coming back!

Really enjoyed this Korean BBQ! The meat is fresh and tasty. The buffet is quite affordable—RM39 for lunch and RM45 for dinner. The service is great too; the staff are very friendly and attentive. Overall, a satisfying dining experience!

Good service and nice food. The food served very fast. Good place dine in for children. My daughters like the pizza and noodles. We enjoyed the buffet very much. Definitely will come back again. Thanks lady boss and staffs.
Authentic taste with many side dishes. The must try is the kimchi soup. Specialty is the intestine. Go for the fried one, cut smaller piece and grill it.

Overall a good experience at this Korean buffet restaurant! The variety is impressive, especially for meat lovers, from marinated chicken to thick, juicy pork belly and even crab, everything was fresh and flavorful. The staff here are friendly and patient, making the whole dining experience even better. Definitely worth a visit if you’re craving Korean BBQ!
